pages.text: Sieving Sand and using the Netherite Mesh will output:$(br)-Coal: 0.15, 0.075$(br)-Apatite: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Cinnabar: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Potassium Nitrate: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Lapis Lazuli: 0.075, 0.0375$(br)-Prosperity Shard: 0.05, 0.025$(br)-Salt: 0.05, 0.025$(br)-Sulfur: 0.05, 0.025$(br)-Uraninite: 0.05, 0.025$(br)-Diamond: 0.03, 0.015$(br)-Fluorite: 0.03, 0.015$(br)-Prismarine Shard: 0.03, 0.015
